stories.original_headline: Scientists discover hidden deep-Earth structures shaping the magnetic field
stories.original_summary: Deep inside Earth, two massive hot rock structures have been quietly shaping the planet’s magnetic field for millions of years. Using ancient magnetic records and advanced simulations, scientists discovered that these formations influence the movement of liquid iron in Earth’s core. Some parts of th
stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Ancient Earth-Heart's Secret Magnetic Influence!
stories.fantasy_story: Deep within the world's core, powerful Alchemists have found two vast, hot rock formations. These ancient structures have quietly woven the planet's protective magical aura for eons. Using old scrolls and scrying pools, they learned these formations guide the liquid metal heart of the world.

stories.original_headline: Endangered sea turtles hear ship noise loud and clear
stories.original_summary: Kemp’s ridley sea turtles, one of the most endangered sea turtle species on Earth, live in some of the noisiest waters on the planet, right alongside major shipping routes. New research reveals that these turtles are especially sensitive to low-frequency sounds—the same rumbling tones produced by sh
stories.fantasy_headline: Rare Sea Turtles Hear Merchant Ships Too Clearly!
stories.fantasy_story: Druids have discovered that the rare Kemp's ridley sea turtles, precious scaled swimmers of the deep, dwell in the noisiest sea lanes. These gentle beasts, already few in number, are surprisingly sensitive to the deep rumble of bustling merchant vessels. The druids seek ways to quiet the waters for their ancient kin.

stories.original_headline: One of the best laptop power banks available is cheaper than ever
stories.original_summary: If you often travel with your gadgets, a fast, reliable portable battery like Anker’s Laptop Power Bank is a worthwhile purchase. Right now, you can buy the silver model at its all-time low price of $87.99 ($47 off) from Anker via Newegg when you apply promo code ENCF232 at checkout. Alternatively,
stories.fantasy_headline: Anker's Magical Charging Stone Now Costs Fewer Gold Coins!
stories.fantasy_story: Travelers often carry many enchanted tools, and a reliable portable magical energy stone is essential. The renowned Anker's Guild of Artificers now offers their finest Laptop Charging Stone at its lowest price ever. This potent artifact, perfect for recharging your magical trinkets on long journeys, is a wise purchase for any adventurer.
